summary: This document is an email chain from January 29-30, 2020, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing the drafting and review of a 'Sharing Order Part II' related to the Epstein case. The order concerns sharing additional trust and will documents received from Epstein's estate attorneys.

events.title: Drafting of Epstein Sharing Order Part II
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the drafting and review of a sharing order application to share additional trust and will documents received from Epstein's estate attorneys.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The subject is the drafting of 'Epstein Sharing Order Part II', an application to share newly received trust and will documents from Epstein's estate.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence sharing related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate following his death.
The emails show coordination between attorneys to accurately describe the materials received from estate attorneys over the preceding two weeks.
No specific individuals are named; all references are to roles or redacted/partial email addresses.
